record.dc:title: 289BN74 Cherry, Benton County, Tennessee. Burials 84BN5 and 6. Burial 5 at left, adult male, fully flexed, skull missing, one tooth present, on back and left side, head NW, right arm across chest, left beneath. Burial 6 on right, adult female in good condition, fully flexed, looks like bundle burial in bottom of pit. Square 20R8. Direction West.
record.wpa:narrative: [84BN5] These are in the bottom of a large pit. [84BN6] Some articulation - knees and acetabulum; certainly some re-burying here. How about disturbed by intrusion of burial 5.
record.wpa:comments: Institution has illustrations of burial on file. See also photo 291BN74.
